properties.areaDesc: Mississippi Sound; South Mobile Bay; North Mobile Bay
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 18 at 6:13PM CST until January 20 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Mobile AL
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Dense Fog Advisory, dense fog will reduce
visibility to one half nautical mile. For the Small Craft
Advisory, north winds 18 to 23 kt with gusts up to 30 kt
expected.

* WHERE...Northern Mobile Bay, Southern Mobile Bay and
Mississippi Sound.

* WHEN...For the Dense Fog Advisory, until midnight CST tonight.
For the Small Craft Advisory, from 3 AM Sunday to noon CST
Monday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft. Low
visibility will make navigation difficult.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

If you must navigate, proceed with caution. Use proper fog
signals. Make sure all running lights are on. Remember to use
your radar and compass.

NWSheadline: DENSE FOG ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM SUNDAY TO NOON CST MONDAY
